english.segment1: We crown You with glory, we crown You with honor. Jesus we crown You with praise. We crown You with song and dance, we crown You with lifted hands. Jesus, we crown You with praise
english.segment2: Sing allelujah to the Lamb. Sing allelujah to the Lamb. Sing allelujah to the Lamb of God
english.segment3: Jesus we crown You with singing, the instruments lift up Your name. with all of our hearts. Jesus You are victorious, righteous, Redeemer. We crown You with praise
english.segment4: Canta aleluya, Canta aleluya, Canta aleluya al Senor
english.segment5: Worthy, Worthy, Worthy. Worthy, Worthy, Worthy. Jesus we crown You with praise
